Package net.mauki.maukiseasonpl.caches.handler

Class Cache<K,V>

java.lang.Object
net.mauki.maukiseasonpl.caches.handler.Cache<K,V>
Type Parameters:
K - The key of the element
V - The value of the element
public class Cache<K,V> extends Object
Caches for anything (key - value)

      Add an element and remove it after a specific period of time
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the element
      value - The value of the element
      millis - The time in milliseconds
      Returns:
      A CompletionStage object which will be triggered after the element got removed or an error occurred
